CustomField.formula: IF( CreatedBy.Profile.Name = "Finisar Partner Community User" ,IF( Target_Price__c < RSM_Min__c ,'BothApprovers', IF( Target_Price__c < REP_Min__c ,'RSM',IF(ISNULL(RSM_Min__c)||ISNULL(REP_Min__c),'BothApprovers','None'))), IF(ISNULL(RSM_Min__c),IF(OR(CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'RSM'),CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'SOM')),'PLM','BothApprovers'), IF( Target_Price__c < RSM_Min__c,IF( OR(CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'RSM'),CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'SOM')),'PLM','BothApprovers'), IF( OR(CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'RSM'),CONTAINS( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name,'SOM')) ,'None','RSM'))))
CustomField.label: Approval From
